recipe.title: How to Make Tamagoyaki
recipe.intro: Tamagoyaki is a sweet Japanese rolled egg. It is a popular side dish for bento.
recipe.ingredients: eggs, sugar, soy sauce, mirin, salt, vegetable oil
steps: **Add** sugar, soy sauce, mirin, and a little salt to the eggs.
**Heat** a little oil in a square pan on medium heat.
**Pour** a thin layer of egg into the pan and roll it to one side.
**Pour** more egg and roll again three or four times. **Enjoy!**

review.content: I went to Mimosa Garden Kitchen last Saturday. It was in a quiet street in Paddington. The garden had many yellow mimosa flowers. I sat at a small table under a tree. I ate tamagoyaki with salad. The egg was soft and sweet. The garden was cozy and very pretty. I felt happy and relaxed there.

lines.speaker: A
lines.text: Hi Liam! Look at my lunch box.

lines.speaker: B
lines.text: Wow, that looks nice! What is the yellow thing?

lines.speaker: A
lines.text: It is tamagoyaki. It is a Japanese rolled egg.

lines.speaker: B
lines.text: Rolled egg? How do you make it?

lines.speaker: A
lines.text: I mix eggs with sugar and soy sauce. Then I cook it in a pan.

lines.speaker: A
lines.text: It is a little sweet and a little salty.

lines.speaker: B
lines.text: That sounds interesting. Can I try a piece?

lines.speaker: B
lines.text: Mmm! It is soft and tasty. I like it!

lines.speaker: A
lines.text: Thank you! I make it every morning for my bento.

lines.speaker: B
lines.text: You should sell it at the cafe! People will love it.
